item.title: [BHS4 - BHS5 - BHS6][Dedicated servers global infrastructure] - Multiple Racks
item.description:
Jul 22, 20:27 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 21/07/2023 18:10 UTC
End Time : 21/07/2023 19:07 UTC
Service impact : The servers on these racks ( T04B35, T04C38, T05D25, T04B14, T04B32, T05E06, T05A33, T05B34, T05B27, B702A12, T05D24, T05C03, T05C28, T05E39, T04C35, T05E30, T05D30, T05D26, T05D38, T05C07, T05E24, T05D37, T05G23, T05E23, T05H14, T05B01,T06G27) were unreachable.
Root cause : It was due to a malfunction on the electrical distribution.
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational
Related incident https://network.status-ovhcloud.com/incidents/0mjl7mr8xtcj
